alert.note: Alert for Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 07 at 7:29PM MDT until further notice by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Idaho... South Fork Clearwater River At Stites affecting Idaho County. For the Clearwater River...including At Stites, At Orofino... elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 730 PM MDT /630 PM PDT/. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR EXCESSIVE RAINFALL IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by recent rainfall. * WHERE...South Fork Clearwater River At At Stites. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect possible flooding to state Highway 13 near the town of Harpster. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM MDT Saturday /5:15 PM PDT Saturday/ the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river stage is currently 7.7 feet and is expected to fall this evening through Sunday. Standing water on Highway 13 and bankfull conditions are expected to continue at least through Sunday. - Action stage is 7.5 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
